titleInfo.title: ‘Route map of the special mission to Seistan and Mekran, from Ispahan to Gwadur by Quarter Master Sergeant David Bower, Royal Engineers. To accompany the Journal of Capn. C. Bean Euan Smith, Personal Assistant to Major-General J.T. Goldsmid, C.B.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:193 x 945 mm, on sheet 315 x 989 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:London, Trel. Saunders lith.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Route of mission shown in line.Boundaries of provinces labelled and indicated by pecked line.Inscriptions:On recto correction in pen and ink to a place name ‘Sir-i-Yezd’ reads: ‘alter i to e’. Amended in print to ‘Ser-i-Yezd’, copy with amendment at IOR/X/3126/3/1.Original manuscript at IOR/X/3126/1.
